verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> for the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>. It is a good <WH2896> thing to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> unto the YY <WH3068>, and to sing praises <WH2167> <WH8763> unto thy name <WH8034>, O most High <WH5945>:
To shew forth <WH5046> <WH8687> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>, and thy faithfulness <WH530> every night <WH3915>,
Upon an instrument of ten strings <WH6218>, and upon the psaltery <WH5035>; upon the harp <WH3658> with a solemn sound <WH1902>.
For thou, YY <WH3068>, hast made me glad <WH8055> <WH8765> through thy work <WH6467>: I will triumph <WH7442> <WH8762> in the works <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>.
O YY <WH3068>, how great <WH1431> <WH8804> are thy works <WH4639> ! and thy thoughts <WH4284> are very <WH3966> deep <WH6009> <WH8804>.
A brutish <WH1198> man <WH376> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8799> not; neither doth a fool <WH3684> understand <WH995> <WH8799> this.

When the wicked <WH7563> spring <WH6524> <WH8800> as the grass <WH6212>, and when all the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> do flourish <WH6692> <WH8686>; it is that they shall be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736> for ever <WH5703>:
But thou, YY <WH3068>, art most high <WH4791> for evermore <WH5769>.

For, lo, thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, O YY <WH3068>, for, lo, thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>; all the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> shall be scattered <WH6504> <WH8691>.
But my shofar <WH7161> shalt thou exalt <WH7311> <WH8686> like the shofar of an unicorn <WH7214>: I shall be anointed <WH1101> <WH8804> with fresh <WH7488> oil <WH8081>.

Mine eye <WH5869> also shall see <WH5027> <WH8686> my desire on mine enemies <WH7790>, and mine ears <WH241> shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> my desire of the wicked <WH7489> <WH8688> that rise up <WH6965> <WH8801> against me.
The righteous <WH6662> shall flourish <WH6524> <WH8799> like the palm tree <WH8558>: he shall grow <WH7685> <WH8799> like a cedar <WH730> in Lebanon <WH3844>.
Those that be planted <WH8362> <WH8803> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> shall flourish <WH6524> <WH8686> in the courts <WH2691> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.
They shall still bring forth fruit <WH5107> <WH8799> in old age <WH7872>; they shall be fat <WH1879> and flourishing <WH7488>;
To shew <WH5046> <WH8687> that the YY <WH3068> is upright <WH3477>: he is my rock <WH6697>, and there is no unrighteousness <WH5766> <WH8675> <WH5766> in him.
